Modify labels using template titles

Function based on ggplot2 labs enabling the use of template_titles along with the ggplot2 + operator.

xpose_labs(...)

# S3 method for gg
+(e1, e2)

Arguments

...

A list of new name-value pairs. The name should either be an aesthetic, or one of "title", "subtitle", or "caption". The value should be a text containing template_titles keywords for the axes, plot title, subtitle or caption.
e1

An object of class ggplot, xpose_plot, or a theme.
e2

A plot component.

Methods (by generic)

  • +: add an xpose_labs layer to an xpose plot.

See also

ggplot2, labs, +.gg

Examples

# Default labels
p1 <- dv_vs_ipred(xpdb_ex_pk)
print(p1)

# Modified labels
p1 + xpose_labs(title   = 'DV vs. IPRED | @run',
                caption = '@dir',
                x       = 'Individual Predictions (IPRED)')
